data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 2,640 believers living in Segovia, Castilla y León, Spain.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Segovia, Castilla y León, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,640 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Segovia, Castilla y León, Spain.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who are far from you in Segovia. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arab, Jordanian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab, Jordanian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab, Jordanian people is yours.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Segovia.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Segovia to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary:
the county of Segovia, Castilla y León, Spain has a population of 164,900.

We estimate Segovia has 2,640 people who might know Jesus, 124,843 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 37,416 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Segovia, Castilla y León, Spain.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.
